title: Group portrait of five boys and three girls, including one standing on left wearing a light colored blouse and plaid skirt, next to large pile of canned foods, possibly for a food drive, including "Campbell's Soups", "Heinz Plum Pudding", and "Laughery Sweet Peas", posed in interior with a piano and chair on the left, chalkboard with long division problem, umbrella and flowers, and a religious image on the right that reads "The Child Samuel Memory Verse - 'Even a child is known by his doings, wether his work be pure, and wether it be right.' on the right
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
